mini_meals.description: Authentic Rajma inspired from the streets of Delhi + Paratha/Rice + Salad. Comfort food at it's best.
Authentic Amritsari chole + Paratha/Rice + Salad. Authentic flavors from the legendary chefs of Amritsar!
Dal Makhni slow cooked overnight with whole spices & fresh cream + Paratha/Rice + Salad. A delightful meal for 1.
Dum aloo cooked in authentic Banarasi style curry + Paratha/Rice + Salad. A meal that keeps you wanting for more.
Mix of veggies + paneer cooked in a desi masala curry + Paratha/Rice + Salad. Subz-e-best!
Homestyle curry with perfectly boiled eggs + Paratha/Rice + Salad. Bet you'll love it a little egg-stra!
The classic Butter Chicken curry: rich, creamy, NOT sweet + Paratha/Rice + Salad. Impossible to resist this one.
Tender chicken slow-cooked with masalas & homestyle onion-tomato curry + Paratha/Rice + Salad.
Grilled chicken cooked in punjabi masala curry + Paratha/Rice + Salad. A perfect balance between spicy & tasty.
Spicy curry & soft chicken, cooked homestyle with whole Indian spices + Paratha/Rice + Salad. A taste you won't forget!

desi_box.description: Dal Tadka + Rice + Salad + Mint Chutney + Garlic Yogurt. Dal Chawal lovers, where you at?
Tangy, creamy, savoury Punjabi Kadhi with onion Pakodas + Rice + Salad + Mint Chutney + Garlic Yogurt. Truly relishing!
Really good Rajma served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt. Comfort meal at it's best!
Amazing combination! Paneer Makhni served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt.
Tender paneer cubes in a creamilicious gravy + Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt. Buttery delight!
Tandoori style chicken with Indulgent makhni curry; Served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt.
Tender chicken slow-cooked in a homestyle masala curry + Rice + Salad + Mint Chutney + Garlic Yogurt.
Fire-grilled chicken tikka in masala curry; Served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt.
Succulent pieces of chicken in a creamy lababdar gravy served with long basmati Rice + Salad + Mint Chutney + Garlic yogurt. Desi & delicious!
Flavourful gravy with succulent chicken cubes & onion with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt. Unbox deliciousness!

dum_biryani.description: [Comes with Raita] Tender marinated potatoes, long & fragrant basmati rice, dum-cooked in a mix of spices. Rich flavours, dum-daar taste!
Assorted fresh vegetables tossed in earthy spices, layered with long-grain basmati rice. A treasure of rich flavors.
Extra-long basmati rice cooked with loads of fire-grilled paneer tikkas & whole spices. Burst of flavours in every bite!
[Comes with Raita] 2 boiled eggs marinated in masalas, layered with basmati rice. A perfect symphony of flavours!
[Comes with Raita, 1 Leg Pc with Bone] Tender chicken tangdi marinated in rustic spices, layered between basmati rice & slow-cooked on dum.
Smoked Chicken-Tikka slow cooked with fragrant basmati rice & whole spices. A truly novel experience! Served with Raita.
Succulent chicken (boneless) layered over aromatic super-long grain rice, slow cooked in quintessential dum style!
Tender mutton chops marinated in whole spices, layered with ultra-long basmati rice: sealed & cooked on a low flame.

main_course.description: Garma-garam soft whole wheat parathas made in Desi ghee.
Extra-long grain basmati rice dum-cooked with whole spices & desi ghee.
Extra-long grain basmati rice flavoured with mild & aromatic Desi herbs.
Perfect way to complement your feast. Thick masala raita with notes of Cumin & fresh Mint.
Toor dal cooked in a Ghee tadka with desi spices & garlic. Can you smell the aroma already?
Tangy, creamy, savoury Kadhi with onion pakodas. Richly flavoured with spices & cooked in the traditional Punjabi style.
Our Dal makhni is slow cooked overnight with whole spices & fresh cream. As traditional as it gets!
Our version of an indulgent butter chicken curry. It's rich, creamy & NOT sweet. It's the real deal.
Succulent chunks of chicken, in an extremely rich gravy. A fabulous blend of creamy and savoury!
Melt-in-mouth mutton in a thick spiced gravy slowcooked homestyle to enrich flavors. We bet you'll go Oh-My-GOSHT!
